verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%> to Philemon, <S%G5371><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> fellow worker, <S%G4904><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> to <S%G27><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%> Apphia, <S%G682><s%> to <S%G27><s%> Archippus, <S%G751><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellow soldier, <S%G4961><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the assembly <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> always, <S%G3842><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers, <S%G4335><s%>

hearing <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints; <S%G40><s%>

that <S%G3704><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> effective, <S%G1756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> comfort <S%G3874><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the hearts <S%G4698><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> have been refreshed <S%G373><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> though I have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G4183><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to command <S%G2004><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> that which is appropriate, <S%G433><s%>

yet for <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%>'s sake <S%G1223><s%> I <S%G3870><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> beg, <S%G3870><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> such a one <S%G5108><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> the aged, <S%G4246><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I beg <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> my <S%G1700><s%> child, <S%G5043><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have become the father <S%G1080><s%> of in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> chains, <S%G1199><s%> Onesimus, <S%G3682><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> was <S%G3588><s%> useless <S%G890><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> is useful <S%G2173><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to me. <S%G1698><s%>

I am sending him <S%G846><s%> back. <S%G375><s%> <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G1161><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> my own <S%G1699><s%> heart, <S%G4698><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> desired <S%G1014><s%> to keep <S%G2722><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> me, <S%G1683><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%> he might serve <S%G1247><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my chains <S%G1199><s%> for the Good News. <S%G2098><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2309><s%> was willing to do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> your <S%G4674><s%> consent, <S%G1106><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> goodness <S%G18><s%> would <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> as of <S%G2596><s%> necessity, <S%G318><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> free will. <S%G1595><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> perhaps <S%G5029><s%> he <S%G5563><s%> was therefore <S%G5124><s%> separated <S%G5563><s%> from you for <S%G4314><s%> a while, <S%G5610><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you would have <S%G568><s%> him <S%G846><s%> forever, <S%G166><s%>

no longer <S%G3765><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a slave, <S%G1401><s%> but <S%G235><s%> more <S%G5228><s%> than a slave, <S%G1401><s%> a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> to me, <S%G1698><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> how much <S%G4214><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> then you count <S%G2192><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> a partner, <S%G2844><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> you would receive <S%G4355><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> he has wronged <S%G91><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> at all, <S%G2228><s%> or owes <S%G3784><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> anything, <S%G1677><s%> put that <S%G5124><s%> to my <S%G1698><s%> account. <S%G1677><s%>

I, <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> this with my own <S%G1699><s%> hand: <S%G5495><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will repay <S%G661><s%> it <S%G1473><s%> (not <S%G2443><s%> to mention <S%G3004><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> owe <S%G4359><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> your own self <S%G4572><s%> besides <S%G4359><s%>).

Yes, <S%G3483><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> let <S%G3685><s%> me <S%G1473><s%> have joy <S%G3685><s%> from you <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Refresh <S%G373><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> heart <S%G4698><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G5218><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> obedience, <S%G5218><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you will do <S%G4160><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> what I say. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Also, <S%G2532><s%> prepare <S%G2090><s%> a guest room <S%G3578><s%> for me, <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> I will be restored <S%G5483><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>
Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow prisoner <S%G4869><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%>
as do Mark, <S%G3138><s%> Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Demas, <S%G1214><s%> and Luke, <S%G3065><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow workers. <S%G4904><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
